author: Howard Levitt
title: Howard Levitt: Can employees refuse to return to work now they’re earning more on CERB?
description: Some workers taking advantage of CERB and employers unwittingly enabling them; plus, a primer to explain the legal predicament employees face with temp layoffs
content:
Since many readers of my Saturday COVID-19 column are new to the vicissitudes of employment law, let me provide a primer to explain the legal predicament employees are now facing.
